Language.name: en
Language.Text:
I had a dream today that I passed away. I was walking through the maze, one identical to the one yesterday, but I did a few adjustments ... then there was a mine … I did not react in time.
I had a similar dream yesterday … the ball squashed me ... and day before yesterday ...
How come that we are still alive?
It seem that somehow we know what to do ...
Yes ... And that is very strange.
Perhaps someone or something is helping us survive.
And someone else is preparing all the traps and deadly obstacles.
This does not make sense.
